jobs.description:
Rolland Berger is a leading strategy consulting firm founded in 1967 in Munich. With offices in 52 countries, it offers a broad range of services across all relevant industries and corporate functions. Known for expertise in transformation, industry-specific innovation, and performance improvement, Roland Berger aims to embed sustainability in all projects. Founded in 1967, the company has an annual revenue of over one billion euros in 2023. The role involves assisting the Group Function Tax Team as a trainee from mid-February 2025 or as a work student from March 2025, preferably at the Berlin office.

Required Technical Skills:  
- Tax-related research  
- Regulatory analysis  
- MS-Office proficiency  

Required Soft Skills:  
- Teamwork  
- Initiative  
- Attention to detail  
- Good communication in German and English  
- Independence  

Preferred/Nice-to-have Skills:  
- Legal knowledge  
- Experience in tax law  

Experience Requirements:  
- Years of experience: Second half of your studies or recently completed  
- Category of experience: Entry-level  

Position Details:  
- Work Location: Onsite (preferably Berlin)  

Additional Information:  
Supportive work environment, diverse team, and mentorship provided;培养负责任的公民和团队协作精神对于现代教育至关重要。因此，开发《大数据与Python程序设计》这一课程的目标不仅是教授学生技术技能，更重要的是培养学生的态度和能力，使他们能够在未来的工作和生活中发挥积极作用。以下是该课程的教学目标：

1. 掌握Python编程：学生将学习Python的语言特性和面向对象的编程概念，为以后的计算和数据分析任务打下坚实的基础。
2. 理解大数据：通过介绍大数据的概念、特性和挑战，学生将了解大数据在现代社会中的重要性。
3. 计算思维和问题解决能力：课程将教授如何使用编程解决实际问题，培养学生的计算思维能力和问题解决能力。
4. 数据可视化：学生将学习常用的Python数据可视化库（如Matplotlib和Seaborn）的使用方法，以便更有效地理解和展示数据。
5. 负责公民和团队协作：通过小组项目和实操练习，学生将学会如何承担责任、贡献智慧、并协同工作解决问题。
6. 职业素养：培养学生良好的职业习惯，包括时间管理、领导和沟通能力，以及独立解决问题的能力。
7. 项目活动：为了让学生将所学应用于实践，课程将设计多个实践项目，如“利用Python进行社会媒体分析”和“数据清洗与可视化案例研究”。

通过这些具体的目标和策略，该课程将使学生能够在充分掌握Python编程和技术技能的同时，培养对社会负责的态度和团队合作能力，使他们成为未来的社会中坚力量。

jobs.description:

Lead developer of the IoT team responsible for developing and managing the embedded software for our IoT system, a key component of our SaaS solution for the concrete industry.

#### Overview
Develop and manage embedded software solutions for our sensors and IoT devices, ensuring our IoT systems are stable, secure, and efficient. Work closely with the software and ML teams to integrate data with the solution and continuously improve our IoT system.

#### Required Technical Skills
- Understanding of embedded systems, software development, and IoT technologies  
- Linux embedded, C/C++ programming  
- LTE technologies and MQTT protocol  
- CAN-Bus, Ethernet, and WLAN communication interfaces  
- Basic knowledge of office software (Excel/Google Sheets) and good documentation skills  
- Proficiency in C/C++, Python  
- Experience with Linux-based systems and tools  
- Basic Excel and Google Sheets knowledge  
- Documentation and technical documentation skills  
- Strong problem-solving and communication skills  
- Familiarity with Git and version control  

#### Required Soft Skills
- Team player mentality  
- Innovative thinking  
- Open-mindedness towards new technologies and processes  
- Client-facing support and solution expertise  
- Agile methodology experience  

#### Preferred/Nice-to-have Skills
- Knowledge of TypeScript, GraphQL, and CI/CD  
- Python and Docker experience  
- Expertise in Windows and macOS environments  
- Knowledge of ABAP, Java, and SAP EHP  
- Experience with enterprise systems and SAP software  
- Experience working with equity options  
- Experience with AWS or similar cloud platforms  

#### Experience Requirements
- Years of experience: 3-5 years  
- Category of experience: Mid-level  
- Specific domain experience: Embedded software development, IoT system management  

#### Position Details
- Work Location: Hybrid (Berlin, office presence required)

#### Additional Information
Flexible working hours, competitive salary, equity options, free snacks and drinks, team activities, mental health platform (nilo.health), pet-friendly environment, customer-facing role, regular knowledge sharing through masterclasses, transparent communication, agile structure, remote application process.
